questions.question: Molecular weight of non-volatile solute can be determined by ........
The depression of freezing point of a solution is .......

answers.a: Inversely proportional to molarity of solution
answers.b: Inversely proportional to molal concentration of solute
answers.c: Directly proportional to molal concentration of solute
answers.d: Directly proportional to molarity of solution
